Text: The Barry Way is a partly unsealed alpine road running from Jindabyne southwest to the Victorian border, where it becomes the Snowy River Road.
Triplets:<The Barry Way

--------------------
Text: Barry Way:  The road passes through some very remote and unspoilt wilderness in the Australian Alps.

Text: Barry Way:  At the NSW/VIC border, the Barry Way becomes known as Snowy River Road and continues southward into the Gippsland region of Victoria.
